name: ghosler-cli
description: A basic, simple CLI for installing, managing a Ghosler instance.

scripts.update-version-internal: node -e "console.log('Updating version...'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = './utils/utils.js'; let content = fs.readFileSync(path, 'utf8'); content = content.replace(/static cliPackageVersion = .*/, 'static cliPackageVersion = \'' + process.env.npm_package_version + '\';'); fs.writeFileSync(path, content, 'utf8'); console.log('Version updated to:', process.env.npm_package_version);"
